entry.title: Hello world
entry.content:
I have decided to start blogging again. I used to blog relatively regullarly about 10 years ago. More or less, when I was actively developing svejo.net. Then I stopped. Blogging regularly requires consistency, time, dedication and even more. However, you reap the benefits much later. I guess that‚Äôs the reason why many people stop blogging (apart from moving to walled gardens like Medium, Twitter, LinkedIn, FB, etc).

Yet, I‚Äôve been observing a slight renaissance in blogging in the last year or two. That, along with the idea that one improves his thinking by writing, made me wanna start blogging again.

Apart from that, the idea of building an RSS reader has been boiling at the back of my head for almost an year. I even bought a domain a few months ago. I have the mantra that one should use what he is building if he wants to make something useful. I think that taking an active part in the blogging community would be the best way to experience the genuine needs of an RSS reader user.

So, let‚Äôs see what happens.
